QuestData.Title: Escape from Silverbrook
QuestData.Description: You... you're not one of them? Quick! Let me out!$B$BWe have to get to Amberpine Lodge immediately! Once Lieutenant Dumont finds out who these people really are, this town will be reduced to rubble!
QuestData.LogDescription: Open the Wooden Cage and help the Freed Alliance Scout escape from Silverbrook. Report to Lieutenant Dumont when you reach Amberpine Lodge.
QuestData.CompletionText: You made it back. I was a worried about you, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: Worgen. Blasted, Light-forsaken, filth-ridden worgen.$B$BIt's time we showed the locals what us civilized folk do with beasts like them.
